description: Master ACCA ATX including Personal Tax Planning, Corporate Tax, CGT Planning, and Inheritance Tax

slides.title: Welcome to ACCA ATX
slides.content:
# Advanced Taxation (ATX)

ATX covers **tax planning** for individuals and businesses.

## What You Will Learn

- **Personal Tax** - Income tax planning
- **Corporate Tax** - Company planning
- **CGT** - Capital gains strategies
- **IHT** - Inheritance planning

## Syllabus Areas

| Area | Weight |
|------|--------|
| Ethics | 10% |
| Income tax | 25% |
| Corporation tax | 30% |
| CGT | 15% |
| IHT | 10% |
| Admin | 10% |

slides.title: Income Tax Planning
slides.content:
# Personal Tax Strategies

## Use of Allowances

| Strategy | Benefit |
|----------|--------|
| Personal allowance | Tax-free income |
| Marriage allowance | Transfer to spouse |
| Savings nil rate | Interest tax-free |
| Dividend allowance | Dividend tax-free |

## Income Shifting

- Salary vs dividends
- Spousal transfers
- Settlement rules

## Pension Planning

```
Contributions get:
- Tax relief at marginal rate
- Tax-free growth
- 25% tax-free lump sum
```

## Avoiding Higher Rates

- Personal allowance taper
- Child benefit charge
- Pension contributions timing

slides.title: Employment vs Self-Employment
slides.content:
# Status Planning

## Tax Differences

| Factor | Employee | Self-employed |
|--------|----------|---------------|
| Tax | PAYE | Self-assessment |
| NIC | Class 1 | Class 2 & 4 |
| Expenses | Limited | More deductible |
| Benefits | Taxable | N/A |

## IR35

Off-payroll working rules.

| Inside IR35 | Outside IR35 |
|-------------|---------------|
| Treated as employee | Normal self-employed |
| Client/agency deduct tax | Own arrangements |

## MSC Rules

Managed Service Company provisions.

slides.title: Business Structures
slides.content:
# Choice of Structure

## Options

| Structure | Tax Treatment |
|-----------|---------------|
| Sole trader | Income tax |
| Partnership | Income tax (partners) |
| LLP | Income tax (members) |
| Company | Corporation tax |

## Company Advantages

- Lower CT rates
- Retained profits flexibility
- National Insurance savings
- Pension contributions

## Incorporation

| Relief | Effect |
|--------|--------|
| Incorporation relief | Defer CGT |
| Gift relief | Hold-over gain |

## Disincorporation

- CGT on shares
- Distribution rules
- Phoenix company rules

slides.title: Corporation Tax Planning
slides.content:
# Company Tax Strategies

## Rate Planning

| Profits | Rate |
|---------|------|
| Small | Lower rate |
| Main | Higher rate |
| Marginal | Relief applies |

## Associated Companies

Share thresholds among group.

## Loss Relief Options

| Option | Effect |
|--------|--------|
| Carry back | Prior year relief |
| Carry forward | Future profits |
| Group relief | Surrender |
| Terminal relief | Final period |

## Capital Allowances

- AIA timing
- Structures and buildings
- Enhanced deductions

slides.title: Groups of Companies
slides.content:
# Group Taxation

## Group Relief

| Type | Definition |
|------|------------|
| 75% subsidiary | 75% ownership |
| Consortium | 75% jointly |

## Surrender of Losses

```
Current year losses
Surrendered to group
Reduce their profits
```

## Capital Gains Group

| Feature | Effect |
|---------|--------|
| Asset transfers | No gain/no loss |
| Degrouping | Charge arises |
| Roll-over | Within group |

## Stamp Duty

- Group relief available
- Reconstruction relief
- Acquisition relief

slides.title: CGT Planning
slides.content:
# Capital Gains Strategies

## Use of Reliefs

| Relief | Effect |
|--------|--------|
| Annual exemption | Tax-free gain |
| Business Asset Disposal | 10% rate |
| Investors' relief | 10% rate |
| Roll-over | Defer gain |
| Gift relief | Hold-over |

## Business Asset Disposal Relief

```
Conditions:
- Trading business
- 2-year ownership
- Officer/employee
- 5% shareholding

Lifetime limit applies
```

## Planning Points

- Use annual exemption
- Timing of disposals
- Spousal transfers
- Loss utilization

slides.title: IHT Planning
slides.content:
# Inheritance Tax Strategies

## Lifetime Planning

| Strategy | Effect |
|----------|--------|
| PETs | Exempt if survive 7 years |
| CLTs | Chargeable at 20% |
| Annual exemption | Reduce transfers |
| Normal expenditure | Regular gifts |

## Business Relief

| Rate | Assets |
|------|--------|
| 100% | Trading business |
| 50% | Business premises |

## Agricultural Relief

| Rate | Property |
|------|----------|
| 100% | Farming land |

## Trust Planning

- Discretionary trusts
- Interest in possession
- Relevant property charges

slides.title: International Tax
slides.content:
# Cross-Border Tax

## Residence

| Status | Tax Position |
|--------|---------------|
| UK resident | Worldwide income |
| Non-resident | UK source only |
| Non-dom | Remittance basis |

## Double Taxation Relief

| Method | Calculation |
|--------|-------------|
| Credit | Lower of UK/foreign |
| Exemption | Exclude income |

## Transfer Pricing

```
Arm's length principle:
Transactions at market price
```

## Diverted Profits Tax

Anti-avoidance for multinationals.

slides.title: VAT Planning
slides.content:
# VAT Strategies

## Registration

| Type | Effect |
|------|--------|
| Compulsory | Above threshold |
| Voluntary | Recover input VAT |

## Schemes

| Scheme | Benefit |
|--------|--------|
| Flat rate | Simplified |
| Cash accounting | Cash flow |
| Annual | Fewer returns |

## Partial Exemption

```
Mixed supplies:
- Taxable: Full recovery
- Exempt: No recovery
- Mixed: Pro rata
```

## Planning Points

- Opt to tax property
- Capital goods scheme
- Transfer as going concern

slides.title: Ethics in Tax
slides.content:
# Professional Ethics

## Tax Advisor Duties

| To Client | To HMRC |
|-----------|--------|
| Best advice | Not mislead |
| Confidentiality | Accurate returns |
| Professional | Comply with law |

## Avoidance vs Evasion

| Avoidance | Evasion |
|-----------|--------|
| Legal | Illegal |
| Use reliefs | Fraud |
| Tax planning | Criminal |

## POTAS

Professional Conduct in Relation to Taxation.

## GAAR

General Anti-Abuse Rule.

- Targets abusive arrangements
- Double taxation of tax

slides.title: Tax Administration
slides.content:
# Compliance

## Penalties

| Default | Penalty |
|---------|--------|
| Late filing | Fixed + % |
| Late payment | % of tax |
| Errors | Behavior-based |

## Behavior Penalties

| Type | Range |
|------|-------|
| Careless | 0-30% |
| Deliberate | 20-70% |
| Deliberate and concealed | 30-100% |

## Enquiries

- HMRC powers
- Information notices
- Discovery assessments

## Appeals

- Internal review
- First-tier tribunal
- Upper tribunal

slides.title: Succession Planning
slides.content:
# Business Succession

## Exit Options

| Option | Tax Treatment |
|--------|---------------|
| Sale to third party | CGT on proceeds |
| Family sale | CGT + gift relief |
| MBO | CGT planning |
| Liquidation | Capital distribution |

## Reliefs Available

| Relief | Effect |
|--------|--------|
| Business asset disposal | 10% rate |
| Hold-over relief | Defer gain |
| Roll-over | Reinvest proceeds |

## IHT on Death

- Business relief (100%)
- Instalment option
- Quick succession relief

slides.title: Trusts
slides.content:
# Trust Taxation

## Types of Trust

| Trust | Tax Treatment |
|-------|---------------|
| Bare | Beneficiary taxed |
| Life interest | Trust taxed at basic |
| Discretionary | Trust at 45% |

## IHT on Trusts

| Entry | Charge |
|-------|--------|
| Creation | 20% over NRB |
| Exit | Proportionate |
| 10-year | Principal charge |

## Income Tax

- Trustees pay at trust rates
- Tax credits on distribution
